item.description: We're hosting a night of Ruby and Rails related Lightning Talks. Five minutes, one projector, multiple presenters, anything can happen! Well, I guess only presentations can happen, but with that begets learning and hopefully some good discussions about best-practices, useful gems, and other interesting topics about our favorite programming language and web framework. Come in to talk, or to learn, or both if you're feeling adventurous. Food, drinks, and code will be served.
item.name: Lightning Round!
